titles.title: Pop Team Epic (2019)
星色ガールドロップ 2
ポプテピピック (2019)
Pop Team Epic TV Special
pop子和pipi美的日常 TV特番

recommendations.recommendation: Must see if you finished the first season of PTE. That specials are the best episodes overall.

anime.description: * Based on a yonkoma absurd comedy manga series written and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr49463 [Ookawa Bkub]. Note: The special has four versions shown on four different channel: Tokyo MX (Blue Dragon ver.), Nico Nico Douga (Vermilion Bird ver.), Abema TV Anilive (White Tiger ver.) and Abema TV Pop Team Epic Channel (Black Tortoise ver.). Each version has a unique combination of seiyuus.

tag.name: live-action imagery
tag.description: This anime incorporates still images and/or video footage of real-world objects and locations into the animation.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: multi-segment episodes
tag.description: Multi-segment episodes are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes], which are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length (up to and including 10 minutes). Also not to be confused with an OVA or music video with multiple (otherwise unrelated) full-length http://anidb.net/t7241 [bundled episodes] consolidated into a single episode video track.

episode.title: コンビニ
The Convenience Store
Konbini
episode.summary: BLACK TORTOISE - PART 1 It’s impossible to have too much Pop Team Epic. Popuko and Pipimi are here to inject even more unapologetic surrealist comedy directly into your synapses! BLACK TORTOISE - PART 2 You thought the last episode was the final one? No way, it’s not over until Popuko and Pipimi say it’s over! Let the next episode commence! Source: crunchyroll
